humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the patient has a 1.4 cm poorly differentiated (G3) invasive ductal breast carcinoma. Based on the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size. Since the tumor size in this report is 1.4 cm, which is less than 2 cm, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC), the T stage for breast cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, it is mentioned that the size of the invasive ductal breast carcinoma is 1.4 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T1.
